author: China Uncensored
description:
China Has a Way into US Military Bases (watch for free)
https://chinauncensored.tv/get/chinese-company-on-us-bases

The Western world — including the United States — is dangerously dependent on Communist China for medical supplies, pharmaceuticals, and even life-saving drugs. If the CCP decided to cut off exports or contaminate the supply, the consequences could be catastrophic.

In this episode of China Uncensored, Chris Chappell dives into:
💊 How China gained control of global pharmaceutical manufacturing
⚗️ Why U.S. factories for antibiotics and generic drugs shut down
🏭 How Big Pharma helped China dominate chemical and drug production
🚨 What the U.S. government is (and isn’t) doing to fix it
🧬 And why “decoupling” from China might be the only real cure

Oper
title: China Owns the Cure—How China Took Over the World’s Drug Supply Chain
